Can anyone confirm that this release isn't missing sections of fights like one of Sir Paul's TUF releases?

SirPaul's last UFC event was complete, but his rips have been in the old 624x352 resolution. the RUDOS rip is 704x400 (as are most x264 rips these days).  If you're not worried about another ~200MB for a passably-better picture, might as well grab the RUDOS rip from s4a.
